posts.post_content:
Good afternoon everyone. I have some cards for sale or as always trading works for me. Prices include shipping. Scans available upon request. Thank you very much. 

T210-2 Baker SGC 40 40.00
T210-2 Shaw SGC 50 50.00
T210-3 Howell P\F 10.00
T210-6 Coleman SGC A 35.00
Lowered the prices a bit to move this fine examples! Thank you.

[quote name="Jason" post=1957265]Lowered the prices a bit to move this fine examples! Thank you.[/QUOTE]

Could I get a pic of the t210-4 McClain?
Thanks!
I'd like a scan of the N172 Madden, if possible.  PM sent, as well.

Thanks![/QUOTE]

Yes sir please provide an email via pm.
PM sent.  I will take the T210 McClain for $13 if still available. Thanks!
Thank you everyone who has purchased cards! Few left with a reduction in price.
All cards so thank you so much everyone!
